content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <?xml-stylesheet href="mmab.xsl" type="text/xsl" ?>  <person>   <name>Robert Grumbine</name>   <title>Physical Scientist</title>   <extension>3747</extension>   <email>Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov</email>   <employer>NOAA/NWS   </employer>   <site>College Park, MD</site>   <blurb>   Work on sea ice remote sensing, modeling, and interactions with the air and sea.  Sea surface temperature remote sensing and assimilation and ocean modeling.  Branch webmaster.  Acting branch chief.   </blurb>   <more>    <group>      <link>/seaice</link>      <text>Seaice</text>     </group>     <group>      <link>/sst</link>      <text>Sea surface temperature</text>     </group>     <group>      <link>/gsf</link>      <text>Gulf Stream</text>     </group>     <personal>      <link>/mmab/people/seaice.new/</link>      <text>Curriculum Vitae</text>     </personal>     </more> </person>
